column4: i have an odd question... is there an alternative to Windows Server? like Ubuntu Server but with all GUI's?
hmmm... usually there are frontends for server applications like freepbx (for Asterisk) or ISPConfig (for website hostings) that are acessible via browser
so instead of messing around the server screen itself you may have a friendly channel of administration thru a web interface.
I don't know this tool. They log into the server to do what ?
